content.raw: I'm unapproving because I just started looking into how ign-gazebo might use `Mesh::FilePath` and encountered what I think might be a roadblock. In the current implementation, resources are fetched via a callback function which doesn't have access to the `FilePath` of the containing object. I haven't delved into it yet, but thought we should hold off till we have a clear way of implementing it in ign-gazebo.
content.html: I'm unapproving because I just started looking into how ign-gazebo might use Mesh::FilePath and encountered what I think might be a roadblock. In the current implementation, resources are fetched via a callback function which doesn't have access to the FilePath of the containing object. I haven't delved into it yet, but thought we should hold off till we have a clear way of implementing it in ign-gazebo.
